ygData.subject: Re: Fiery Avenger really that good?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... tries.  You also have to ... well stacking our ... AC beyond that of a ... more hit points by itself. ... the classes pretty ... roleplaying game on the
ygData.messageBody:
---Tim West <twest@...> wrote:
>
> From: "Tim West" <twest@...>
>
>
>
> My Paladin only misses once out of every eight
tries. You also have to
> take into account that we can buff ourselves pretty
well stacking our
> spirit armor, bravery, and guard spells to take our
AC beyond that of a
> warrior or monk and Symbal of Tranzil to add 250
more hit points by itself.
>
> I think Verant has done a pretty good job in making
the classes pretty
> comparable.
>
>

Yeah... ell wait till you get to level 45 or so...
take on a monk... and watch him toast your butt.
